name: Hentai Babes - Broken Vows
detailed_description:
Adult Content Disclaimer

All Characters depicted in this game is above 21 years old. This game is designed for ADULT only, it contains sexually explicit materials and thus might be offensive to some people. If you're underage according to local law, if you're easily offended or it is illegal where you live to consume such content, please exit now. Continue on at your own risk.

Hentai Babes - Broken Vows is a puzzle game,you only need to swap the bricks to restore the pictures.The game support cheating mode and browsing pictures with one hand that you can unlock all pictures in just one minute.

If you don't like to solve puzzle, there is a instant solve feature. Just click on top left screen dot for the option on the top right screen to show.

There is no time or star limit in the game, you are supposed to enjoy the relaxing experience.

This game theme is forbidden fruits female being in compromise sexual situations. Enjoy!!!
